Simply incredible. The story and the way cutscenes are handled is incredible, the amount of detail that goes into everything shows you Valve really do care about their product more than anything else and the physics engine holds up surprisingly well. The gunplay is lacking and a bit repetitive but you'll never get sick of grabbing an explosive barrel and flinging it at a group of Combine soldiers and watching their ragdolls be launched into the stratosphere; it's like crack in videogame form and just as addictive. I'd recommend using MMod as it makes the gameplay feel less dated with improved reload animations, settings for projectile bullets and better lighting and water effects as well as higher quality weapon models and more exaggerated animations.

After my castration surgery, I thought I would never be able to experience the joy of having an orgasm ever again. However, playing this game makes me feel like I'm climaxing and the orgasm I'm having is never ending. Magically, it's like my testicles were never sucked up by that industrial vacuum. Everything in this game is done to near perfection. Now, just me hearing the words Alyx or Mr. Freeman is enough for me to bust a hefty load.

Empece Half-Life 2 en 2020 y lo terminé en 2021, es más largo que la biblia de mi tío Paco. (lo termine en 15 horas +5 para los logros)
Ahora en serio. No voy a contar nada nuevo que toda la comunidad de Steam no sepa, este juego es el juego. De verdad, si alguna vez has sentido la curiosidad de saber como es este juego, te recomiendo al 100% que lo juegues y lo disfrutes, que a pesar de ser lanzado en 2004, me atrevería a decir que le da bastantes vueltas a algunos juegos de hoy en día teniendo en cuenta los años de diferencia.
Very great nostalgic game for old players and for new ones too !
